/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ import React from "react"; import "./Shared.css"; import "./Footer.css"; import { Footer } from "./Footer"; import { Instruction } from "./Instruction"; export const HertzLite: React.FC = () => { return (

Change comes from within.

But that's no reason to travel alone.

Introducing Hertz-lite.

A connected tool for a connected world.

The difference.

With{" "} Hertz. {" "} we developed a novel feedback mechanism that turbocharges your practise, developing powerful vagus nerve control and offering a new means of controlling anxiety. With{" "} Hertz-lite. {" "} we removed this individualised feedback mechanism, replacing it with a simpler standard mechanism.

The payoff.

For our networked world we need connected tools.{" "} Hertz-lite. {" "} connects to a global timing server, so that when you start your practise, you do it in sync with every other connected user.

The magic.

Will it make any difference to you to do your practise in perfect unison with others, all around the world? Our yoga teacher certainly seems to think so, and there's only one way to find out.



Just a few minutes a day, for the rest of your life.

); };
